description: Archetype-specific high-value indicators that help refine confidence within passed trades

primary_indicators.name: iv_percentile
primary_indicators.description: How expensive vol is vs history
primary_indicators.threshold: >80 = spreads preferred, <50 = long options viable

primary_indicators.name: implied_vs_historical_move
primary_indicators.description: Market pricing vs historical PDUFA moves
primary_indicators.threshold: Historical avg +/-35%

primary_indicators.name: adcom_vote
primary_indicators.threshold: Unanimous positive -> 97%+ approval

primary_indicators.name: crl_resubmission_count
primary_indicators.threshold: First resubmit: 60-70%, second: lower

primary_indicators.name: priority_review_designation
primary_indicators.threshold: Priority Review correlates higher approval

primary_indicators.name: short_interest_float
primary_indicators.threshold: SI >20% + approval = amplified upside

primary_indicators.name: annualized_spread
primary_indicators.description: True return metric accounting for time

primary_indicators.name: days_since_hsr
primary_indicators.threshold: >30 days no second request = positive

primary_indicators.name: break_fee_pct
primary_indicators.threshold: >3% = serious deal, <2% = watch for superior offers

primary_indicators.name: financing_condition
primary_indicators.threshold: Fully committed vs 'subject to' language

primary_indicators.name: definitive_vs_loi
primary_indicators.threshold: Definitive = 94% base rate, LOI = much lower

merger_arb.kill_screen_note: VIX >30 -> avoid new merger arb (credit freeze, financing at risk)

primary_indicators.name: activist_historical_win_rate
primary_indicators.threshold: Elliott ~70%, unknown fund = discount

primary_indicators.name: stake_size_pct
primary_indicators.threshold: >5% = serious, >9.9% = max pre-disclosure, 10%+ = all-in

primary_indicators.name: board_structure
primary_indicators.threshold: Staggered board = longer, annual election = faster

primary_indicators.name: stated_intentions_13d
primary_indicators.threshold: Vague 'enhance value' vs specific 'sale of company'

primary_indicators.name: days_since_13d
primary_indicators.threshold: <90 days = early stage, >180 = expect escalation

primary_indicators.name: institutional_ownership_concentration
primary_indicators.threshold: Top 10 holders >50% = fewer allies needed

primary_indicators.name: iss_glass_lewis
primary_indicators.threshold: Proxy advisor support shifts outcomes

primary_indicators.name: form_10_status
primary_indicators.threshold: Form 10 filed = spin is real and dated

primary_indicators.name: spinco_vs_parent_valuation_gap
primary_indicators.threshold: SpinCo 6x EBITDA in 12x sector = revaluation thesis

primary_indicators.name: index_inclusion_exclusion
primary_indicators.threshold: SpinCo too small for S&P 500 = forced selling by index funds

primary_indicators.name: debt_allocation
primary_indicators.threshold: SpinCo loaded with debt = value trap risk

primary_indicators.name: insider_actions_post_spin
primary_indicators.threshold: Insiders buying SpinCo in first 30 days = strong signal

primary_indicators.name: institutional_forced_selling_window
primary_indicators.threshold: Days 1-30 = max forced selling, optimal entry 30-90

spinoff.timing_note: Best opportunities 30-90 days post-spin when forced selling ends

primary_indicators.name: discount_to_stated_nav
primary_indicators.threshold: >15% discount to conservative NAV = interesting, <10% = insufficient

primary_indicators.name: asset_composition
primary_indicators.threshold: Cash + marketable securities = reliable NAV, illiquid = discount justified

primary_indicators.name: distribution_timeline
primary_indicators.threshold: 3 distributions over 6mo vs 2 years = different annualized

primary_indicators.name: cash_burn_rate
primary_indicators.threshold: Monthly G&A / NAV = decay speed

primary_indicators.name: trustee_track_record
primary_indicators.threshold: Experienced trustee vs first-time = timeline reliability

primary_indicators.name: contingent_liabilities
primary_indicators.threshold: Pending litigation, environmental = discount justified

liquidation.return_calculation: (NAV - Current Price - Expected Costs) / Current Price / Years

primary_indicators.name: cluster_size
primary_indicators.threshold: 3+ insiders in 2 weeks = cluster, single buyer = weaker

primary_indicators.name: dollar_amount_vs_compensation
primary_indicators.threshold: CEO buying $2M when salary $500K = meaningful, $50K = noise

primary_indicators.name: insider_role_hierarchy
primary_indicators.threshold: CEO/CFO > VP > Director weight accordingly

primary_indicators.name: purchase_vs_option_exercise
primary_indicators.threshold: Open market only, ignore exercises and 10b5-1

primary_indicators.name: historical_insider_accuracy
primary_indicators.threshold: Some companies' insiders have strong timing

primary_indicators.name: time_since_last_cluster
primary_indicators.threshold: Cluster 2 weeks ago = actionable, 3 months = stale

primary_indicators.name: proximity_to_known_catalyst
primary_indicators.threshold: Buying 30 days before event = higher signal

cluster_strength_scoring.strong: 3+ insiders, >$500K total, includes C-suite, within 14 days

primary_indicators.name: bill_status
primary_indicators.threshold: Introduced < Committee < Floor vote < Conference < Signed

primary_indicators.name: sponsor_count_bipartisanship
primary_indicators.threshold: Bipartisan sponsors increase odds dramatically

primary_indicators.name: committee_markup_completed
primary_indicators.threshold: Post-markup = serious, pre-markup = speculative

primary_indicators.name: cbo_score
primary_indicators.threshold: Budget impact affects vote math, unfunded mandates = harder

primary_indicators.name: similar_bill_passage_rate
primary_indicators.threshold: Infrastructure vs healthcare reform = very different rates

primary_indicators.name: lobbying_spend
primary_indicators.threshold: Heavy lobbying against = uphill, industry support = tailwind

primary_indicators.name: congressional_calendar
primary_indicators.threshold: Lame duck, election years, recess affect timelines

legislative.honest_truth: Legislative catalysts have worst Info Half-Life predictability. Size accordingly.

cross_archetype_indicators.name: 52_week_range_position
cross_archetype_indicators.application: Near lows = more reflexive selling risk
